| Overview             = '''Bio-Synthezoids''' are a group of [[Synthezoids]] created by [[Alkhema (Earth-616)|Alkhema]] in her hopes of creating new life. However it was revealed she was following [[Ultron (Earth-616)|Ultron]]'s programming to build them as his new army.{{r|Avengers: The Ultron Imperative Vol 1 1}} 

| HistoryText             = Alkhema used a "[[Plastoid Birthmatrix]]" to create them. However it was revealed she was  following Ultron's programming to build them as his new army. Their first action after their creation was to rebuild their leader Ultron.{{r|Avengers: The Ultron Imperative Vol 1 1}} 

Ultron started a war between the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]], the [[Robos]], the [[War Toys]]. [[Clinton Barton (Earth-616)|Hawkeye]] later killed Alkhema using a [[Vibranium]] arrow and blew up the base killing all the robots including the Bio-Synthezoids.{{r|Avengers: The Ultron Imperative Vol 1 1}}
